data.name: Elektra
data.description: A stealthy assassin capable of dealing immense damage to a single target.

starItems.name: Elektra
starItems.description: A stealthy assassin capable of dealing immense damage to a single target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>95%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>95%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead and gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead and gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
3.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead and gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead and gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead and gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, or the target is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from target

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from target

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>390%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
3.nextUpgrade:
Start with <color=#86e619>3</color> ability energy
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>390%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>460%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>530%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

1.description: On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to a random adjacent <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally. <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

2.description: On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to a random adjacent <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally. <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>85%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to a random adjacent <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally. <color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>85%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death.
3.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy for self
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to a random adjacent <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally. <color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus.
 > <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus.
 > On Spawn, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy for self.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>85%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death.
4.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all adjacent <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> and <color=#fff568>HAND</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all adjacent <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> and <color=#fff568>HAND</color> allies. <color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus.
 > <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus.
 > On Spawn, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy for self.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>85%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> on Death.
